Class GameOfLife

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      GameOfLife
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class GameOfLife
extends javax.swing.JApplet

A GameOfLife that prints out a grid of Cells and modifies them based on the rules of Conway's Game Of Life.

Version:
1.0 2015-04-27
Author:
David Chi 3
See Also:
Serialized Form
